questions.question: What is the primary source of drinking water for your household?
Do you get enough clean drinking water for your household's needs throughout the year?
Does your household have its own private toilet/latrine?
Do any members of your household still have to defecate in the open?
How do you primarily dispose of your household's solid waste (garbage) and liquid waste (wastewater)?
Please provide the age of each child in your household between 6 and 17. For each child, please state if they are currently enrolled and attending school.
Are there any members of your household between the ages of 18 and 23? If so, are they currently enrolled in any post-higher secondary education?
If your household belongs to a Scheduled Caste (SC), are your eligible school-going children receiving their pre-matric and post-matric scholarships?
Is your household covered under any government health protection or insurance scheme (like Ayushman Bharat)?
Are you aware of and able to get an emergency ambulance by making a phone call when needed?
Were the children born in your household in the last year delivered at a hospital or a health facility?
Have all children under 1 year of age in your household received their full, age-appropriate vaccinations?
options: No children in this age group

questions.question: For children born in your household in the last year, was their birth weight recorded? Was any child identified as having a low birth weight (less than 2.5 kg)?
Have any children in your household (aged 0-5 years) been identified as underweight by a health worker or Anganwadi?
options: No children in this age group

questions.question: In the last year, has your household experienced the death of a pregnant woman or a child under the age of one?
If any member of your household was diagnosed with a major communicable disease in the last year, did they receive and complete the full prescribed treatment?
Are all eligible members in your household receiving the Old Age Pension they are entitled to?
Are all eligible members in your household receiving the Widow Pension they are entitled to?
Are all eligible members in your household receiving the Disability Pension they are entitled to?
Is your house a 'Kachcha' structure (made of materials like mud, thatch) or a 'Pakka' structure (made of brick, cement)?
Do you consider your house safe to live in?
Does your household have a legal electricity connection?
Does your household use at least one LED bulb for lighting?
Does your household have and use a gas connection (LPG) for cooking?
If your household engages in farming, have you been issued a Soil Health Card?
What portion of your farming is done using organic methods (without chemical fertilizers or pesticides)?
Do you use any watershed management techniques (like farm ponds, check dams, etc.) on your agricultural land?
Does every person in your household over the age of 5 have an Aadhaar card?
Does at least one member of your household have an account in a Bank or Post Office?
Are all eligible members in your household enrolled in the Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY) and Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana (PMJJBY)?
Does your household have access to the internet (e.g., on a mobile phone, home connection)?
Is there a Common Service Centre (CSC) or Cyber Cafe in or near your village that you can access?
How many members of your household can be considered digitally literate (i.e., can use a smartphone or computer for basic tasks like online payments or sending messages)?
Have any eligible youth (approx. 15-35 years old) from your household undergone any formal skill development training?
Have any eligible youth in your household successfully availed a bank loan for self-employment or to start a business?
Is any member of your household an active member of a Self-Help Group (SHG)?
